publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-610 Alex Fergusson: People, Pensions and Post Offices-That the Parliament notes the House of Commons Trade and Industry Committee report People, Pensions and Post Offices: the impact of 'Direct Payment' on post offices and their customers; commends the recommendations of the report that Her Majesty's Government should revisit a number of areas of policy which could be improved to help to give customer choice as well as protecting post offices; very much regrets, however, the response of Her Majesty's Government which ignores the great majority of the recommendations, and urges the Scottish Executive to encourage Her Majesty's Government to pursue the implementation of the report in order to safeguard the future of Scotland's rural post offices. Supported by: David Mundell*, John Scott*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-610 People, Pensions and Post Offices (lodged on 17 November 2003) Murdo Fraser*, Donald Gorrie*
